Articles.Content:
Hey lads,

After browsing around a lot, scratching my head and flying into the sun twice, I still couldn't find out which mod features exactly what I want.


Which mod(s) do you guys suggest to use along with Planetary Base Systems for a nice base/station?


I am mainly looking for a Life Support mod.

I'm not so easy, here are my requirements to spice the request up a bit:
- Planetary Base Systems supported/compatible
- Deep Freeze supported/compatible
- Self-sustaining for bases/station would be really nice, but optional

The main idea is that I gotta restock my (space) planes or rockets sometimes
Re-supply mission every many years can't harm too much (just not too often)


Thanks in advance,
Robin

Well, Wild Blue Industries has Snacks! and I know for a fact that Angel-125 has created Deep Freeze parts for the WBI set. PBS and all the WBI mods play well together and there are even parts to bridge between them. Both PBS and WBI have greenhouse bits or ways to create the life support stuff.  Snacks! is probably one of the easier LS mods, and may be mostly about just keeping food nearby. I scare myself away from LS mods, so I don't know how deep it goes on the resource chain, but it's an option.

USI-LS also has KPBS and DF support and is highly customizable to your playing style. It will require resupply missions occasionally but there are a lots of ways you can extend supplies (recyclers, greenhouses)

EDIT: Nevermind, I misunderstood the original request.
